about_the_game:
Joan goes through tough times at school. She has a hard time integrating herself with her classmates. It doesn’t feel like she belongs there.
When she falls for Rachel, everything changes. But Rachel’s hiding a deadly secret that could change Joan’s life forever. Will love be enough to overcome her fears?

What to expect?


  • A story that deals with the main character suffering from social anxiety disorder.
  • Unique low poly art.
  • Retro 80’s soundtrack by Karl Casey

R is for Rachel feels like reading a novel, where the story moves forward based on what you type.
For fans of text-based-story-driven games with strong LGBT themes.
